com.googlecode.kevinarpe.papaya.jdk.properties
Interface JdkPropertiesLoader

public interface JdkPropertiesLoader

Loader for Java properties.

The provided implementation is a derivative of original class Properties and methods related to loading of Java properties files. Original source code: Properties.java

To access an implementation, see JdkPropertiesLoaderUtils.getInstance().

Author:
Kevin Connor ARPE (kevinarpe@gmail.com)
See Also:
JdkPropertiesLoaderUtils, Properties

Method Summary
 RandomAccessList<JdkProperty> load(InputStream byteStream)
          This is a derivative of the original Properties.load(Reader).
 RandomAccessList<JdkProperty> load(Reader characterStream)
          This is a derivative of the original Properties.load(Reader).
 

Method Detail

load

RandomAccessList<JdkProperty> load(Reader characterStream)
                                   throws IOException
This is a derivative of the original Properties.load(Reader). The result is a list of map entries, instead of a Hashtable. As a result, more careful analysis and checking of the loaded entries is possible.

Parameters:
characterStream - stream of characters to read. To read from a file, use FileReader. To read from a string use StringReader.
Returns:
mutable list of mutable entries. Order of entries follows input exactly. Duplicate keys and key-value pairs may exist.
Throws:
NullPointerException - if characterStream is null
IOException - if an error occurred when reading the stream
IllegalArgumentException - if a malformed Unicode escape appears in the input
See Also:
Properties.load(Reader), load(InputStream)

load

RandomAccessList<JdkProperty> load(InputStream byteStream)
                                   throws IOException
This is a derivative of the original Properties.load(Reader). The result is a list of map entries, instead of a Hashtable. As a result, more careful analysis and checking of the loaded entries is possible.

Parameters:
byteStream - stream of bytes to read. To read from a file, use FileInputStream
Returns:
mutable list of mutable entries. Order of entries follows input exactly. Duplicate keys and key-value pairs may exist.
Throws:
NullPointerException - if byteStream is null
IOException - if an error occurred when reading the stream
IllegalArgumentException - if a malformed Unicode escape appears in the input
See Also:
Properties.load(InputStream), load(Reader)
